summary: WHILE ATTEMPTING TO TAKE CHILD OUT OF CHILD SAFETY SEAT. CONSUMER STATES WHEN THE RED PRESS BUTTON  WAS PUSHED  TO LIFT THE PLASTIC ARM FROM OVER CHILD TWO SPRINGS POPPED OUT.  CONSUMER STATES THE SPRINGS POPPED FROM WHERE THE ARM CONNECTS TO THE BASE.  CAUSE IS UNKNOWN.  CONSUMER FEELS THE SEAT MAY BE DEFECTED, AND THOSE SPRINGS ARE DANGEROUS FOR A SMALL CHILD.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION. TS
